column2: "Na nkorɔfo bi fii Judea bae bɛkyerɛkyerɛɛ enuanom no dɛ
column3: Sɛ woenntwa hɔn twatsia dɛ mbrɛ Moses amambra tse a

column2: "Na akasakasa nye ekyingye pii baa Paul nye Barnabas na hɔn ntamu no
column3: wɔhyɛɛ dɛ asɛm no ntsi Paul nye Barnabas nye hɔn mu binom nkɔ asomafo no nye mpanyimfo no hɔ wɔ Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na asɔrmba no begyaa hɔn kwan no
column3: wokotwaa mu wɔ Fonisia nye Samaria kaa amanamamfo hɔn nnuhu no ho asɛm; na iyi maa enuanom no nyina dzii dɛw kɛse."

column2: "Na wodur Jerusalɛm no
column3: asɔrmba nye asomafo nye mpanyimfo no maa hɔn akɔaba
column4: na wɔkaa dza Nyankopɔn dze hɔn ayɛ nyina kyerɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na binom a wofi Farisiifo fɛkuw no mu a wɔagye edzi no soɛree na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Ɔsɛ dɛ wotwa hɔn twatsia na wɔhyɛ hɔn ma wodzi Moses mbra no do."

column2: "Na asomafo nye mpanyimfo no tuu egyina dwendween asɛm yi ho."
"Na wɔgyee kyim pii wɔ ho no
column3: Peter soɛree
column6: homankasa hom nyim mbrɛ Nyankopɔn sii saan mu yii me fii hom mu dadaada
column7: dɛ amanamamfo mfa m’ano do ntsie asɛmpa no

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn a onyim akoma mu no edzi hɔn dase
column3: ɔama hɔn Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔdze maa hɛn so;"

column2: "na ɔamma soronko bi ammba yɛnye hɔn ntamu
column3: na ɔnam gyedzi do atsew hɔn akoma mu."

column2: "Na afei ɔyɛ dɛn na hom rosɔ Nyankopɔn hwɛ
column3: dɛ hom dze kɔndua a hɛn egyanom nye hɛn enntum annsoa bɔto esuafo no kɔn do yi?"

column2: "Na yɛgye dzi dɛ ɔnam Ewuradze Jesus n’adom do na wɔbɛgye hɛn dɛ hɔn so."
"Na nyimpadodow no nyina yɛɛ dzinn: na wotsiee Barnabas nye Paul a wɔreka nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze a Nyankopɔn nam hɔn do ayɛ wɔ amanaman no mu no."
"Na wɔyɛɛ dzinn no
column3: James buaa dɛ: Enuanom

column2: "Simeon aka mbrɛ asɔpɔn no Nyankopɔn bɔhwɛɛ amanaman
column3: dɛ oribeyi hɔn mu ɔman ama ne dzin."

column2: "Na iyi so na nkɔnhyɛfo no nsɛm nye no saa
column3: dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw dɛ
column6: mebɛsan Esi David ntamadan a ɔahwe ase no bio; Na mesi dza oedwuruw no bio. Na mama do esi

column2: "Ma nyimpa nkaa no aahwehwɛ Ewuradze ekyir kwan
column3: Nye amanaman a wɔabɔ me dzin wɔ hɔn do nyina."

column2: "Ewuradze a ofi wiadze ahyɛse yi
column3: yinom kyerɛ dɛ wonyim no no

column2: "Dɛm ntsi m’asɛm a mowɔ ka nye dɛ mma yɛnnhaw hɔn a wofi amanaman mu adan aba Nyankopɔn hɔ no;"
"na mbom yɛnkyerɛw nkɛma hɔn dɛ wonyi hɔnho mfi ehonyi efifidze
column3: nye ndwamansɛm nye mbowa a woennhue hɔn bɔgyaa enngu na wowuwui

column2: "Na ofi tsetse mbersantsen na Moses wɔ hɔn a wɔka no ho asɛm wɔ nkurow nyina mu
column3: wɔkenkaan no wɔ nhyiamudan mu ahomgyeda daa."

column2: "Nna ɔsɔɔ asomafo nye mpanyimfo nye asɔrmba no nyina enyi dɛ wɔpa hɔn mu mbarimba bi a wɔbɔsoma hɔn aka Paul nye Barnabas ho akɔ Antiok: hɔn nye Judas a wɔfrɛ no Barsabas nye Silas
column3: enuanom no mu etsitsir bi:"

column2: "na wɔkyerɛɛw nwoma hyɛɛ hɔn nsa dɛ
column3: Asomafo nye enuanom mpanyimfo no kyia enuanom a wofi amanaman mu wɔ Antiok nye Siria nye Silisia:"

column2: "Susuampa dɛ yɛatse dɛ binom a wofii hɛn mu kɔree dze nsɛm abɛhaw hom asɛɛ hom adwen
column3: naaso yɛannhyɛ hɔn dɛm ntsi
column5: "ɔyɛɛ hɛn dɛ oye dɛ yɛayɛ anokor yi
column6: yɛpa mbarimba na yɛsoma hɔn nye hɛn adɔfo Barnabas nye Paul a wɔyɛ"

column2: "nyimpa a hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ntsi wɔdze hɔn nkwa ama no ba hom nkyɛn."
"Dɛm ntsi yɛasoma Judas nye Silas a wɔdze hɔn ano so bɛka hom nsɛm no ara."
"Na ɔsɔɔ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no nye hɛn so enyiwa dɛ yɛnnkɛfa adzesoa biara ato hom do dɛ dza ohia yi ara:"
"dɛ hom nyi homho mfi nam a wɔdze abɔ afɔr ama ehonyi
column3: nye bɔgya
column4: nye mbowa a woennhue hɔn bɔgyaa enngu na wowuwui nye ndwamansɛm ho: ɔno na sɛ hom yi homho fi ho a
column5: obowie hom yie. Onsi hom yie."

column2: "Na afei wogyaa hɔn kwan no
column3: wɔbaa Antiok
column4: na wɔboaboaa nyimpadodow no ano no

column2: "Na wɔkenkanee no
column3: wodzii dɛw wɔ awerɛkyekyer no ntsi."

column2: "Na Judas nye Silas a hɔnara so yɛ nkɔnhyɛfo no
column3: dze nsɛm pii tuu enuanom no fo

column2: "Na wɔkyɛɛr hɔ kakra no
column3: enuanom no gyaa hɔn kwan dwudwoodwo ma wɔkɔr hɔn a wɔsomaa hɔn no hɔ."

column2: "[Naaso Silas pɛɛ dɛ ɔbɛtsena hɔ ara.]"
column3: "#15.34 Tsetse akyerɛwfo no binom dze nkyekyɛmu 34

column2: "Na Paul nye Barnabas tsenaa Antiok
column3: wɔnye dodowara a wɔka hɔn ho

column2: "Na nda bi twaa mu no
column3: Paul see Barnabas dɛ
column4: Ma yɛnsan nkɛsera enuanom no wɔ nkurow a yɛkaa Ewuradze n’asɛm wɔ hɔ nyina mu

column2: "Na Barnabas pɛɛ dɛ wɔbɛfa John a wɔfrɛ no Mark no aka hɔnho."
"Na Paul anndwen dɛ oye dɛ wɔbɛfa nyia ɔtwee noho fii hɔn ho wɔ Pamfilia
column3: na ɔnye hɔn annkɔ annkɛyɛ edwuma no

column2: "Na akasakasa a ɔyɛ dzen bae
column3: ma hɔn ntamu tsetsewee
column4: na Barnabas faa Mark faa nsuenyi kɔr Siprus;"

column2: "Paul dze ɔfaa Silas
column3: na enuanom no dze no hyɛɛ Ewuradze adom nsa no

column2: "Na okotwaa mu wɔ Siria nye Silisia hyɛɛ asɔrasɔr no dzen."
